headline: UnitedHealth Group Confronts Earnings Shock And Medicare Strain With Reset Plan
summary: UnitedHealth Group (NYSE:UNH) is confronting a sharp single day stock drop tied to weak earnings and a projected revenue contraction for 2026. The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) has proposed a minimal Medicare Advantage rate increase for 2027, adding regulatory pressure. The company is responding with leadership changes, including the return of former CEO Stephen Hemsley, and a new Back to Basics plan focused on core operations. Management is also pushing AI driven cost and...
